item.name: Satchel of Unmet Needs
entries: This bag resembles a Bag of Holding but resists any attempts to place objects into it. On the underside of the front flap is an embroidered message: "Sdeen temnur uoyro fedivor pot tub dlohot tsixet onodi."
The bag weighs about 20 pounds despite appearing empty and rattles when shaken as though stuffed to the brim with glass, wood, and metal objects.

Anyone can reach into the bag, speak aloud the name of one of the objects listed below, and retrieve it. When placed back into the bg, the item will vanish and can be recalled at any time by reaching into the bag again. A second of the same object cannot be produced while the first still exists.

If an item retrieved from the bag is destroyed or remains outside the bag for 24 hours, all matter comprising it vanishes into thin air. That item will be "missing" from the bag, unable to be retrieved, until 3 dawns have passed.
You can procure the following objects from the Satchel of Unmet Needs:

items: A piece of {@item chalk (1 piece)|phb}, a pencil, or an {@item ink pen|phb} and {@item ink (1 ounce bottle)|phb}
A {@item bell|phb}, chime, or {@item signal whistle|phb}
An emtpy glass {@item flask|phb}, {@item vial|phb}, or {@item glass bottle|phb}
Up to 30 feet of {@item hempen rope (50 feet)|phb} or up to 15 feet of {@item chain (10 feet)|phb}
A mundane {@item lock|phb} and matching key
A {@item hooded lantern|phb} or {@item bullseye lantern|phb}
A wooden bucket or {@item iron pot|phb}
